comment: Explains the information efficiently, and the content of the class is interesting.

His class is fairly easy & he's super chill. While it's lecture heavy, he makes the class interesting.

I took this over the summer, but he was willing to work with us accordingly to ensure we weren't overloaded. As long as you pay attention in class you should do well on the two in-class written essays + group project, he prepares you accordingly.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Awesome professor - clear communication around assignments and grades. Wants to see you succeed. I would highly recommend.
